text:
The group proceeded through Choco Volcano,
relying on the map left by the staff.

In the middle of the steep volcanic path,
Ganran, who was in the lead, stopped and looked around.

name: Ganran
text:
The location indicated on the map seems to be around here...
I'll look around a bit.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, if it's a map left by the staff,
whether it's rock cacao or a trap,
there must be something.

name: Ryusei
text:
Alright, leave it to me!
I'm pretty good at finding things!
I'll search all over with these legs—!

name: Ryusei
text:
Ah... My soleus muscles, they're the best today too...!
Good, good, I feel like I can do anything!

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, Ryusei-san's muscle check,
it's in today too!

name: Hitomi
text:
If we all look together,
we'll surely find it right away!
Let's do our best!

At Hitomi's words,
the group cheered and began searching the surroundings.
Soon, Ryusei called out.

name: Ryusei
text:
—Oh, everyone! Come here!
This light... could it be!

name: Hitomi
text:
It's mostly buried and only a little bit is visible,
but the surface is sparkling!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, this resembles the sparkle of rock cacao!
Ganran, what do you think?

name: Ganran
text:
Oh, yeah, there's no mistake!
It really was a treasure map!
I don't see any traps either!

At [Player]'s words,
Ganran handed over the pickaxes he had been
carrying on his back to the hunters.

name: Ganran
text:
We'll dig it out using the same method as yesterday!
Hito-chan, use this pickaxe!

name: Hitomi
text:
Thank you.
B-but, what if I break it again—

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha! Iron Rule, number one!
'Trust your companions and look forward'!

name: Ganran
text:
Even so, I'm called the best craftsman in the village!
Hito-chan, give it your all!

name: Hitomi
text:
O-Okay...!
I'll believe in Ganran-san!

name: Hitomi
text:
Alright, here I go!
—Aiyah!!

The pickaxe Hitomi swung down delivered an impact
strong enough to crack the ground around the rock cacao.

However, the pickaxe itself showed
no deformation or damage whatsoever.

name: Hitomi
text:
...A-Amazing! It's perfect!
Ganran-san, thank you!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
This is my job, after all!
I'm delighted that you're pleased too!

name: reXer
text:
The ground became much easier to dig all at once!
Thank you, Ganran, Hitomi!
Leave the rest to me!

name: reXer
text:
I'm also a NeoTalents hero.
I train regularly by swinging down in axe mode!

reXer held the pickaxe and raised it.
The pleasant sound of metal and mineral clashing echoed around.

name: Ryusei
text:
reXer-kun, you're really motivated!
I can't fall behind either—!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, Ryusei, let's go together!
It's a cooperative play!

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha, it's like a game!
Alright, then I'll dig over here!

reXer and Ryusei rhythmically dug out
the rock cacao buried in the ground using pickaxes.

name: Ganran
text:
Oh, that's good!
If we clear away that big rock over there,
we should be able to pull it out!

name: reXer
text:
Alright, leave it to me!
—Haaah!!

When reXer delivered the final blow,
the rock cacao finally revealed itself before the hunters.

name: Hitomi
text:
No matter how many times I see it,
it's still sparkling and so beautiful—!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, I still can't
believe this is food...

name: Hitomi
text:
It's so beautiful that I want to display it at home!
It'd be a waste to eat it!

Hitomi's eyes sparkled as she carefully
picked up the rock cacao from the ground.
—That's when it happened.

name: Hitomi
text:
Kyaa!? A-An earthquake again!?
—Ah, the rock cacao...!

The rock cacao that Hitomi was gently holding
slipped through her arms and fell to the ground.

name: Ganran
text:
Ohhh...!?
This earthquake is lasting quite some time...!

name: reXer
text:
Everyone, get down to the
ground so you don't fall!

name: Ryusei
text:
[Player]-san, grab my arm!
...[Player]-san?

Without even taking Ryusei's outstretched hand,
[Player] looked around.

options.text: It's similar to when we were at Mount Fuji...!

name: Hitomi
text:
F-Finally, it's subsiding...!
When it suddenly shook so violently, it surprised me...!

name: Ganran
text:
It's been a long time since such a big tremor...!
It's good that no one got hurt.

name: reXer
text:
Our luggage scattered,
but it seems we can retrieve it quickly.

name: reXer
text:
Ryusei, [Player].
Could you give me a hand?
...What's wrong with you two?

name: Ryusei
text:
Are you alright, [Player]-san?
You look very pale.
Don't push yourself and rest a bit.

options.text: Everyone, there's something I need to tell you...!

text:
It was when [Player] looked up at the hunters.
A creepy feeling ran down their spine.

name: Hitomi
text:
...Ah, th-the rock cacao!
Is that a monster...!?

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha, it looks so much like it—!
Is it a robot?
They even have a scene where it steals the rock cacao—!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
Now they're going to try and interfere
by recovering the dropped rock cacao?

name: reXer
text:
Amazing, it feels just like the real thing.
NeoTalents' meticulousness even extends to this—

Interrupting their words,
[Player] performed transformation operations on the heroes.

options.text: Keep your distance and prepare for battle!

name: Ganran
text:
Wh-What did you say!?
Hito-chan, get away from it!

name: Hitomi
text:
Y-Yes!
Why would a monster appear
in a volcano like this...!?

name: reXer
text:
We can think about that after we defeat this thing.
[Player], please give us operational support!

The heroes formed their formation
and turned to face the monster.
However—

The monster vanished in an instant,
as if it simply melted into the darkness.

name: Ryusei
text:
...I-It disappeared!?
[Player]-san, can you still sense the monster?

name: Hitomi
text:
It might still be hiding somewhere!
Everyone, please stay alert!

[Player] stopped operating the drone,
closed their eyes, and heightened their awareness.

[Player] traced the presence
of the monster in the surroundings.
However, at that moment—

name: Ryusei
text:
Whoa!?
Be careful, everyone!

name: reXer
text:
...A-Another earthquake?
Are they this frequent in Garunderra...?

name: Ganran
text:
No... This is really strange.
Small tremors happen occasionally, but...

name: Ganran
text:
...Shaking at such short intervals,
it's been like this ever since the day Barte disappeared...

name: Ganran
text:
—Whoa...!
It's shaking at a time like this...!

name: Ganran
text:
Barte, a monster has appeared in the village!
You evacuate immediately!
I'm going to go deal with it!

name: Barte
text:
Ah, okay.
Master, you too-

name: Barte
text:
Wh-What is this!?
My body's being pulled...!

name: Ganran
text:
—Barte!!
Grab my hand, and don't let go no matter what!!

name: Barte
text:
...Damn it!!
What is this uneasy feeling...!?
Let go of me!!

name: Barte
text:
Ganran, my, my strength...!
Help me! Ganran, Gan—

name: Red Monster
text: —Gwoooohhh...!!

name: Ganran
text:
...L-Lies.
Barte...Barte—!!
No...!!!

name: Ganran
text:
Ah...
That day...
the same—

options.text: Oh no, the presence has vanished...!
It doesn't seem to be nearby.

name: Ryusei
text:
...According to Ganran-san's story,
there were many earthquakes when the monster
appeared in the village, right?

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, ah...
That's right, several large tremors continued, and then suddenly,
a path and a monster appeared in the village—

As if to interrupt Ganran's words,
[Player]'s device announced an incoming emergency call.

options.text: ...I have a bad feeling about this.

text:
Immediately answering the call,
the holographic Obsidius spoke snappingly
as soon as the call connected.

name: Obsidius
text:
—Can you hear me, [Player]!?
So the hunters are with you too.
I know you are currently filming, but this is an emergency!

name: Obsidius
text:
Just now, reports of monster sightings
have been pouring in from the village!
Are you alright over there!?

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, we're fine.
But, monsters are starting to appear here too...!

name: Obsidius
text:
...Damn it, there too.
But right now, there are only a few staff members
and you guys on the volcano.

name: Obsidius
text:
Among the staff staying in the village,
the ones who can fight are helping with evacuation guidance, but...
we don't have enough hands!

name: Obsidius
text:
The staff on the volcano,
I've sent word for them to return to the village.
reXer and the others, come back immediately!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, understood!
We'll descend immediately.
Ganran, the closest route is... What!?

The largest tremor yet struck them all.
And then, a roaring explosion like a rumble echoed.

Immediately afterwards,
large and small rocks tumbled down from the cliff
near where [Player] and the others were standing.

name: Ganran
text:
—Watch out!!
Rocks are falling!!
Everyone, jump into that cave!!

name: Ryusei
text:
...Y-Yeah!
[Player]-san, this way!

name: Hitomi
text:
Th-That was scary...!
If we hadn't transformed beforehand,
we wouldn't have been able to withstand the tremor...

name: reXer
text:
Ah, that was a tremendous tremor...!
Obsidius, are you alright over there?

When reXer looked up and called out,
in that video feed—

Choco Volcano, reflected behind Obsidius,
was stained red.

name: Obsidius
text: —It's starting to erupt!?

name: Obsidius
text:
Ugh, everyone calm down!
Monsters might appear!

name: Villager
text:
That mountain has been dormant for so long!
If the pyroclastic flow comes this way, we'll be swallowed!

name: Stuntman
text:
—Residents!
Don't panic, come this way!

name: Stuntman
text:
...D-Don't push! Please calm down!
We will definitely protect you!

name: Obsidius
text:
...[Player]!
You can see it, can't you,
the volcano you're on has started erupting!

name: Obsidius
text:
Evacuate immediately!
...Hey, [Player]?

At Obsidius's words,
[Player] looked up.

And, from the holographic image,
they shifted their gaze towards the back of the cave.
...Grrrooooo...!

options.text: There's a boss in the depths of the volcano!

name: reXer
text:
...I see,
[Player] was also discerning whether
it was a real monster by its presence earlier.

name: Ryusei
text:
I've heard that some "Observers"
are sensitive to the presence of monsters, but—

name: Ryusei
text:
...[Player]-san,
you look really pale, are you alright?
Don't push yourself.

name: Obsidius
text: ...Indeed, monsters "devour" recognition.

name: Obsidius
text:
If it's a mountain as well-known as Choco Volcano,
it wouldn't be surprising for it to become a target to be devoured.

name: Obsidius
text:
Before, when monsters appeared in the city,
we encountered a case where a giant monster was nesting in another location.

name: Ganran
text:
...Beyond this point,
the path continues into the volcano.

name: Ganran
text:
I've only gone partway in when I came to collect minerals.
I don't know how dangerous it is inside.

Ryusei, with the same expression
as the groaning Ganran, continued speaking.

name: Ryusei
text:
...The presence [Player]-san sensed deeper
inside is stronger than other monster we just encountered, right?

name: Ryusei
text:
If so, if such a monster were to descend
from the volcano into the village...

name: Hitomi
text:
That's... right.
The villagers would surely be in danger.

name: reXer
text:
It seems the cause of Choco Volcano's sudden eruption is also that monster.
We don't know what will happen if we leave it alone.

name: Ganran
text:
At worst,
the entire village could be wiped out...

name: Ganran
text:
Finally...
I finally thought I could achieve the "peace" he wanted,
together with Barte...

Ganran lowered his head slightly
and gripped the pickaxe he was holding tightly.

name: Ganran
text:
Damn it, unpleasant thoughts keep crossing my mind.
...How many times do you have to take
something important from me before you're satisfied...?

name: reXer
text:
Ganran...
I understand your feelings a little.

name: reXer
text:
...My father was devoured
by a monster and disappeared.

name: reXer
text:
No one remembered him,
and that was so frustrating and lonely...

name: reXer
text:
—That's why I'm a hero now.
We both want to defeat monsters.

At reXer's words, Ryusei also
looked up and gazed at Ganran.

name: Ryusei
text:
...I was also caught in a monsters
disaster when I was a student.

name: Ryusei
text:
At that time,
I had no stamina and was left behind...
I thought it was the end for me.

name: Ryusei
text:
But a hero saved me just
before I was devoured by one.

name: Ryusei
text:
Because I met that person,
I was able to be reborn like this.
But—

Ryusei glared sharply,
revealing his hostility towards the monsters.

name: Ryusei
text:
...They instantly destroy something
precious that someone has built up.
I cannot forgive that.

name: Ryusei
text:
Now, I think it's my turn.
It's an "act of returning love",
right, Hito-chan?

name: Hitomi
text:
Ryusei-san...
Yes! That's right, we haven't given
anything back to the villagers yet!

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, I want to protect the villagers too.
The people who are trying to be brave,
now it's my turn to protect them!

reXer nodded to Ryusei and Hitomi,
then extended his hand to Ganran.

name: reXer
text:
...Before, I got so desperate that I rushed
ahead alone and ended up just spinning my wheels.

name: reXer
text:
All I could think about was wanting everyone to remember my father,
and I ended up causing trouble for my companions around me.

name: reXer
text:
—But, the me now is different.
I realized something back then.
So, Ganran, let us go together.

Ganran gazed at reXer's hand
extended towards him.

Then, he looked up, met reXer's serious gaze,
straightened his back, and burst out laughing.

name: Ganran
text:
...Gahahaha!
My bad, for making you worry!
I was making such a pathetic face!

name: Ganran
text:
That's right,
I won't let anything like that happen again!
If there's a monster, it's a hero's job to punch it away!

name: reXer
text:
Ganran...!
Ah, thank you.

name: reXer
text:
[Player], you're sure the monster
is deeper inside, right?

[Player] nodded in response
to reXer's confirmation.

name: Hitomi
text:
But, there are reports of monster sightings
gathering in the village, aren't there...?

name: Ryusei
text: Yeah, it's only the presence [Player] sensed, but—

The hunters nodded to each other.
Then, they turned their gaze to [Player].

name: Ganran
text:
...Iron Rule, number one!
'Trust your companions and look forward'!
I believe in you, [Player]!

name: Obsidius
text:
—[Player]. Ah, understood.
It's you guys, you'd go even if I tried to stop you, right?

name: Obsidius
text:
Leave the evacuation
guidance to me and the staff.
Go punch that monster!

name: Obsidius
text:
...But from this feeling,
it wouldn't be surprising if a full-scale eruption starts soon.

name: Obsidius
text:
Finish it as quickly as possible.
As soon as things calm down here,
I'll contact you again immediately.

name: Obsidius
text:
...Listen, [Player].
Just don't get hurt.

Nodding to Obsidius,
[Player] ended the communication.

name: Ryusei
text:
Alright, we have to protect the village!
Let's go deeper!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes! The cave is dim,
and there might be another earthquake.
Everyone, let's proceed carefully!

name: reXer
text:
Ganran, as long as it's
what you've already known,
can you guide us?

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
Of course, I'm a guide!
Come on, follow me!

Ganran readjusted his luggage.
And the group stepped deeper into the cave,
from which heat was overflowing.

name: reXer
text:
...S-Such tremendous heat.
Is this the heat of magma?
It doesn't seem like we can stay long...

name: Ryusei
text:
That's right, we have to defeat the monster quickly.
Even so, [Player]-san, you noticed the monster's presence so well.

name: Hitomi
text:
That's right,
since we don't understand it,
it's very reassuring!

options.text: Dormant monsters don't have a presence.

name: Ganran
text:
A dormant monster, huh...
Is that why earthquakes are frequent
because it's trying to wake up?

name: Ganran
text:
But, there are volcanoes on Earth too, aren't there?
Can you tell the difference between volcanic tremors
and earthquakes caused by monsters?

options.text: Mount Fuji almost got devoured by a monster.

text:
At [Player]'s words,
Ryusei spoke up.

name: Ryusei
text:
Ah, I know about that too.
That was when Orient City was sealed off, right?

name: reXer
text:
The commotion in Japan
was also news in America.

name: reXer
text: [Player] was involved in that incident too...

name: Hitomi
text:
If the monsters are causing earthquakes,
perhaps the volcano was stimulated by them?

name: Hitomi
text:
If a monster rampages inside the volcano,
it makes sense that an eruption would occur.

name: Ganran
text:
That possibility seems high...
It's ordinarily unthinkable for this path to be so hot.

name: Ganran
text:
If we take our time,
we might get burnt to a crisp!

Looking up,
they could see magma flowing and high-temperature
steam erupting in their line of sight.

Gazing at the situation,
Ryusei spoke to [Player].

name: Ryusei
text:
...Hey, [Player]-san.
I have a suggestion, if that's alright with you?

name: Ryusei
text:
We've stopped the camera since the monster appeared,
but should we resume filming for the show?

options.text: Even though it's such an emergency...!?

text:
To [Player]'s surprised voice,
Ryusei continued with a serious face.

name: Ryusei
text:
It's an emergency now with the volcanic eruption and the monsters,
but precisely because of that, let's call for a calm response over there too.

name: Ryusei
text:
There must be people watching the show.
It'll surely reach them!

name: Ryusei
text:
This is also a chance to
show our professionalism as entertainers!

name: Hitomi
text:
That's right!
We, the influential "celebrities",
can't afford to lose our composure!

name: reXer
text:
...Ah, that's right.
[Player], let's start the camera.
It's more efficient if we can stream on multiple lines.

name: reXer
text:
That drone can probably withstand this heat, and in a pinch,
it's better to have as much ViewPower as possible, right?

name: reXer
text:
There might be viewers
who will help us after seeing this.

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, and with this stream,
we might be able to encourage the villagers too!

name: Ryusei
text:
Even amidst fear, it might be a message
that they're not fighting alone!

options.text: I'll recruit viewers with live comments.

name: Ryusei
text:
Thank you, [Player]-san.
Don't push yourself if filming is difficult!
Safety first, as the footing is also bad.

It was just as Ryusei said that.
Suddenly, a creepy sensation assaulted [Player].

name: Monster
text: —Gi, Gigi...!!

name: Ryusei
text:
...It seems to be a different individual
from the monster that appeared earlier!

name: reXer
text:
Even in this heat,
t seems completely at ease...

name: reXer
text:
However, we don't have time to be bothered by an enemy like this.
Let's finish it quickly and move on!

name: Hitomi
text: Yes, [Player]-san, please operate!

name: Ganran
text:
If it's a battle not for filming,
there's no need to hold back at all!
I'll reforge it with a bang!
Battle Start

name: Ryusei
text:
...Here I go, reXer-kun!
Use my power!

name: Ryusei
text:
—"Health and Beauty"!
Pose of Reverse!

As Ryusei struck a pose,
light overflowed from his Parallel Weapon.

That powerful light enveloped
the other heroes as if to encourage them.

name: reXer
text:
Ryusei, that helps!
—Haaah!!

name: Ganran
text:
Good, it's working!
But, reXer, watch out!
There's still more further in!

name: Ganran
text:
It seems to be a quite sturdy enemy—
But I won't lose to its hardness and heat!

name: Ganran
text:
Take this!!
—"Forging"!
Schmieden Schatz-axt!!

Ganran blew away the monster that
was about to attack [Player] and the others.

name: Hitomi
text:
[Player]-san, please give me ViewPower too!
I'm going to assist reXer-san!

Nodding at [Player]'s words,
Hitomi began to sing.
Her voice reached reXer.

name: reXer
text:
Thank you, Hitomi!
With this, I should be able to deal enough damage!
But...!

reXer glared at the remaining monster.
That particular one was near the magma.

name: Monster
text: —Gigigigiiiii...!!

name: reXer
text:
I can't attack from this distance!
I could blow away the surroundings with a shockwave, but...

options.text: The magma will burst out, it's dangerous!
It's better not to disturb the wall carelessly...!

name: Ganran
text:
If we carelessly break the wall,
magma might flow out and the eruption could accelerate!
It'd be good if we could just target the monster, but...

name: reXer
text:
Even so, my weapon is an ax-sword!
All I can do is jump in and slash...!

name: reXer
text:
...Damn it, there are too many
magma areas and no usable footholds!
Is there any way—

Searching for an opening to attack,
reXer continued to run through the high-temperature magma zone.

At that moment, as if waiting for his cue,
the monster changed its stance and launched a rock-throwing attack.

name: reXer
text:
...Alright!
You misjudged my attack!
I can counter this!

name: reXer
text:
This is the end!
—"Pursuit"! Oversyncro Execution!

Deflecting the attack and countering it,
he blew away only the monster.

The attack, imbued with the power of the Parallel Weapon,
pierced its core, and the monster sank into the magma.

name: Ryusei
text: Phew, that was close!

name: Hitomi
text: We did it!

name: Ganran
text: Good job, all of you!

name: reXer
text: That was a good fight.

name: reXer
text:
...Hah, hah.
Ah... somehow, we managed.

name: Ganran
text:
reXer, you're sweating a lot.
...Are you alright?
You shouldn't overdo it.

name: Ryusei
text:
I know we're in a hurry, but let's take a short break.
[Player]-san, if you have any drinks, please give them to reXer-kun.

Nodding at Ryusei's words,
[Player] handed a drink to reXer.

Finding a relatively safe spot,
the group settled down there.

name: reXer
text:
...Ah, thank you.
It was quite a struggle, but I can still fight.
This stage is not going as smoothly as I thought.

name: reXer
text:
Sorry, everyone.
Next time, I'll be careful not to get too exhausted...

Sipping his drink,
reXer muttered to himself.

name: reXer
text:
...How would my father have defeated it?
How would my father think about this battle...?

name: reXer
text:
No, I have to surpass my father.
...Hah, still a long way to go.

name: reXer
text:
[Player] advised me to be myself, but...
I still don't know any other way.

options.text: That was really good just now too!

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, reXer-san.
You always talk about your father, don't you!
You really love him!

name: Hitomi
text: That's how much you look up to him!

name: reXer
text:
...Ah, he's someone I love very much!
And he's also a goal I have to surpass!

name: Hitomi
text:
I also love my father and mother very much,
and I consider them important people.

name: Hitomi
text: So, I understand how reXer-san feels.

Hitomi looked into the distance
with a nostalgic expression.

name: Hitomi
text:
...I loved idols since I was little.
I collected cards and stickers of my favorite idols.

name: Hitomi
text:
That feeling grew stronger and stronger,
and I decided to audition.

name: Ryusei
text:
Is that so!
Your parents must have supported you too, Hito-chan?

Hitomi quietly shook
her head at Ryusei's words.

name: Hitomi
text: ...At first, both of them strongly opposed it.

name: Hitomi
text:
They said being an idol isn't something you can easily aim for and become,
so they wanted me to focus on studying and school life for that time.

name: Ganran
text:
I understand that feeling a bit.
Hito-chan's father and mother must have been worried.

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, it was also because I had just awakened to my hero powers,
so they worried a lot about my future.

name: Hitomi
text:
But, once I decided to do it,
they told me to do it with all my might,
and they've been supporting me ever since!
Hitomi faced reXer and smiled.

name: Hitomi
text:
So, I want my parents to
see me doing my best as an idol!

name: Hitomi
text:
Because they opposed me back then,
I thought a lot and was able to seriously aim to be an idol!

options.text: That was Hito-chan's turning point, huh.
I'm sure both of them are happy!

name: Ganran
text:
That's right,
those parents must be proud.

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, I think Hito-chan is doing her best as an idol!
I'm sure it's reaching them too!

name: Ganran
text:
When Hito-chan is recording for ChocoFull,
it's really feels convincing, like an actual idol is doing it!

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, thank you.
...When I wanted to become an idol,
when I wanted to hold someone's hand—

name: Hitomi
text:
Because I had those days of struggling a lot,
I am who I am today!
I feel that way now.

name: Hitomi
text:
It might be trivial to others.
But for me, it was a very important time.

reXer nodded back to the smiling Hitomi.
Then, as he slowly stood up,
he gazed straight into the depths of the cave.

name: reXer
text:
...Ah, that's right.
Thank you, Hitomi.
I'll think about it a little more.

name: reXer
text:
I'll think and think and think—
And then, I'll come up with my own answer.
Because [Player] told me too.

options.text: You'll definitely reach a good answer!

text:
Nodding in response to [Player],
reXer looked back at the heroes.

name: reXer
text:
...Thank you, everyone.
I was able to rest quite a bit.
Now, let's proceed deeper!

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, we have to hurry!
We have to quell the monster commotion!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes!
Otherwise, we'll collapse from the heat too!

The group, wiping their sweat,
began walking again.

name: Ganran
text:
What's wrong, Ryusei?
...Are you thinking about something?

name: Ryusei
text:
...Yeah.
What Hito-chan said earlier
is bothering me a little.

name: Ryusei
text:
Was the period of worrying
an important time for me...?
.........

name: Ryusei
text:
I wonder if I'll ever be able
to feel that way about my past self.

name: Ganran
text:
...Anyone might feel that way.
It's not something you can easily overcome.

name: Ganran
text:
...I'm the same.
When Barte was entrusted to me by her parents,
when Barte disappeared—

name: Ganran
text:
...There's no day I don't regret it, but even so,
we have no choice but to move forward.
To always believe that there's hope.

name: Ganran
text:
But, you'll surely be alright.
You've trained your body and been reborn,
haven't you?
Ganran grinned at Ryusei.

name: Ryusei
text:
...Ganran-san, thank you.
That's right, I have to make an effort to change!
Just like I trained my body, I'll train my mind.

name: Ganran
text:
Yeah! It's mental muscle training!
Let's do our best together!

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah,
I'll do my best so I can be proud of myself,
the "me" that I love!

Ganran and Ryusei
bumped fists and laughed.

And then, they ran towards reXer and the others.
Towards the depths of the volcano,
from which heat was overflowing.
Chapter 5 - Somehow Hanging in There
